fields.title: How to write a project proposal?
fields.content:
Dear Students,
Please refer the information in the links below to write a project proposal.
https://www.fool.com/the-blueprint/project-proposal
https://www.mavenlink.com/resources/project-proposal
The project proposal will be completed in four weeks.
Thanks and good luck.
Loan Nguyen

fields.title: Assignment policies and topic information
fields.content:
Dear Students,
The students in a class can be divided into groups of 6. Then choose a topic from the assignment_2021 folder in Content. Each topic belongs to only one group.
The student representative in the group fills in the following link:
https://bit.ly/3zVtlBA
and creates a group on the IU platform.
Good luck!
Regards,
Loan Nguyen

fields.title: Code and Link to Login the Discrete Maths Class

Sinh NV
